title: Serious Music
overview:
Two broke comedians go from rags to riches when a pop superstar / 
garbage boy mistakes their parody video for a really sick jam and hires 
them to be his new songwriters. It may not be their dream job, but for 
the good of society, they're going to get in his dope AF car, take his 
money, and turn him from garbage boy into an actual human being.
